properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
E tich angwen motelone
sandne Yesu Ruodhwa. x2
Neno kawo Makati
mogwedho Neno nginyo. x2
Nopogo -
nejolupne kanowacho negini
chamuru mae ringra.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chamuru ringre Yesu
madhuru rembemaler
ng'ama chamo ring'reno
noyudi ngima maber. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bang'e kendo nokawo
kikombe Mar Divai. x2
Nenogwedho mopogone
jolupne Divai no. x2
Kowacho -
kauru ma mondumadhi
uduto mae remba,
remo maler. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yesu jawar nowacho
nejolupne en jahawi. x2
Ngama chamo makati
kendo madho Divai ni.
Noyudi -
ngima maber kata kotho
to nyaka ana chiere,
chieng'giko. x2
